content:
The HL7 ballot for CDS Hooks is up at http://cds-hooks.hl7.org/

Thank you to everyone who has helped out on this project. Your Connectathon implementation feedback, pull requests, issues, chat/mailing lists discussions, and general feedback has been awesome and this project wouldn't be a success without each of you.

I'll have a mailing list post with the details of the ballot later tonight and will cross post it here. Have a great holiday weekend everyone!
Here's the mailing list post I promised with more information on the ballot.

I started the import of the 150 ballot comments tonight into the Github issues for the docs repository. I imported 144/150 and was then blocked by Github as my bot triggered abuse detection. :boom: :smile:
....actually, I only was able to import 36/150 tonight. I should have waited to import until tomorrow rather than attempt it after several hours of successfully importing ~1000 issues.
Hmmm, apparently a sleep(2) between each API call does the trick!
Maybe include a rand() in there too, it might pick up that the gap is the same later...

btw, I'm going to clean up my importer script and open source it later today. Others may find it useful in the future (or at least the part where I formatted the Github issues with nice emojis, Github user references, etc)
